scripts.build: dotenvx run -f .env -- docker compose -f compose.yml up --build --no-start
scripts.build:dev: dotenvx run -f .env -- docker compose -f compose.yml -f compose.dev.yml up --build --no-start
scripts.start:dev: dotenvx run -f .env -- docker compose -f compose.yml -f compose.dev.yml up --detach
scripts.start:integration: dotenvx run -f .env -- docker compose -f compose.yml -f compose.integration-test.yml -p int up --detach
scripts.stop:integration: docker compose -f compose.yml -f compose.integration-test.yml -p int down --volumes
scripts.restart:dev: npm run stop:dev && npm run start:dev
scripts.test:debug: npm run auth -- npm run test:debug
scripts.test:integration: npm run start:integration && docker compose -p int logs && docker compose -p int exec auth npx prisma migrate dev && docker compose -p int exec auth npm run test:integration && npm run stop:integration
scripts.prepare: husky && npm run build && npm start && npm run db:migrate:dev
scripts.db:migrate:dev: npm run auth -- npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:migrate:prod: npm run auth -- npx prisma migrate deploy
scripts.db:generate:artifacts: npm run auth -- npx prisma generate
